title: Is Jumbo-Visma Too Strong? Riders, Teams ‘Fed Up’ with Grand Tour Dominance
content:
Rivals growing frustrated behind Jumbo-Visma's growing dominance, and there are renewed calls for some sort of budget guidelines or salary caps: 'There are few options for the smaller teams.'

Read the full article at Is Jumbo-Visma Too Strong? Riders, Teams ‘Fed Up’ with Grand Tour Dominance on Velo.
author: ahood
